column5: hey gangs.... I have a friend who go fishing with me most of the time and he got a conservation license and he wanted to change it sport... my question is...   Can he upgrade his conservation license to sports / pay the difference?  or  He has to buy the sports in full??  any OFNer's done this before??...  thnxs bfisher
He just has to go buy the sport license sticker.
even though he bought conservation sticker already?? it cant be upgraded... that sucks lol...
Yea, I had to do the same thing a few years ago
Crappy tire was out of sport stickers on the pike opener so I had to get a conservation. Less fish to clean I guess.
